body:
## Description

- [x] Add interactive paramerter 
- [x] infinite text generation
- [x] rename PYTHON_API to NE_PYTHON_API

related issue: https://github.com/intel/intel-extension-for-transformers/issues/411

By default, `generate` does not use the history commands each time it is run
```bash
['Once upon a time, a little girl named Alice was dreaming of her future. She dreamed about an exciting adventure and she would like to share it with all you guys! So join the cute']
['Once upon a time, a little girl was born and she grew into the most beautiful woman in this whole world.\nEvery day we can see her everywhere; on TV commercials or ads for']
['Once upon a time, a little girl was born.\nWhen she turned 18 months old her mother took the young woman and showed her to our Lord Jesus Christ in church one Sunday morning as']
['Once upon a time, a little girl named Emily was born and grew up in the United States. She didn’t go to school every day but did get an education of sorts from her']
['Once upon a time, a little girl was born. She lived with her family in the town of Bethlehem and she did not have much to eat or wear because they were very poor']
['Once upon a time, a little girl named Annie was given the gift of having her own baby doll.\nShe loved playing with it but because she is in public school and has to wear']
['Once upon a time, a little girl was sitting in her room. She had been staring out the window for hours now, and she couldn’t help but wonder what this day would bring']
["Once upon a time, a little girl named Annabelle was born. She had long brown hair and beautiful blue eyes just like her mama's!\nAs she grew up, it"]
['Once upon a time, a little girl fell in love with the beauty of nature.\nHer imagination was inspired and her passion for art ignited by spending endless days playing outside on long summer']
['Once upon a time, a little girl called Sasha lived far away from her parents. She had to stay in England with strangers and she was very unhappy because of it. At nighttime']
```

when `interactive=True`, history will be used in generate function
```bash
['Once upon a time, a little girl named Alice was dreaming of her future. She dreamed about an exciting adventure and she would like to share it with all you guys! So join the cute']
[' princess']
[' in one of our exclusive games called ‘Alice’s Wonderland Hair Salon’. Prepare your mind because this is going to be another amazing']

['’re going to meet all your favourite characters from this fantastic story! In our game online called ‘Alice’s Wonderland Hair Salon’,']
[' Alice is so excited about meeting everyone, that she wants a new look before the first day of school begins. The princess has lots and lots of plans']
[' for her upcoming term at Hogwart School but now it all depends on you to help this cute girl who loves fashion games online more than anything else in']
[' the world! So let’s meet everybody together because we need your advice as a professional hair stylist, so start with Alice first. You can']
```

title: Enable "neuralchat predict" for Intel GPU
body:
## Type of Change

Add xpu support for neuralchat predict

## Description

Enable "neuralchat predict" for Intel GPU

## Expected Behavior & Potential Risk

Expected Behavior: neuralchat predict --query "Tell me about Intel Xeon Scalable Processors." can be run on Intel PVC and Arc GPU.

Potential Risk: Only "neuralchat predict" command is tested.

## How has this PR been tested?

1. build itrex from source code

2. install packages
    cd intel_extension_for_transformers/neural_chat
    pip install -r requirements_xpu.txt
    pip install --no-deps -r requirements_xpu_no_deps.txt

3. run command
    neuralchat predict --query "Tell me about Intel Xeon Scalable Processors."
You can use xpu manager to observe status of Intel GPU during running command.

## Dependency Change?

1. In requirements_xpu.txt, only packages needed for "neuralchat predict" command are added and removed others.

2. peft is imported when neuralchat is launched, while it has compatibility issue with torch for xpu, so put it in requirements_xpu_no_deps.txt and need to install with --no-deps at the time being.

Risk here is that whether we can truly validate the ITREX Graph int4 capability on Windows Platform with an accepted performance. cc @a32543254 @intellinjun @zhenwei-intel 

## How has this PR been tested?

Run the notebook

## Dependency Change?

The dependencies are subset of the original requirements.
However, we need a Python 3.10 validated ITREX package on Windows (cc @VincyZhang)+ NeuralChat requirements-pc.txt (I already listed it in the PR) + Jupyter notebook (ipykernel).

Still, I'm not quite sure what is missing here. We need a double-check it with a fresh environment here.
